files.patch:
@@ -585,0 +585,14 @@ + /** + * Checks if this duration is positive, excluding zero. + *

+ * A {@code Duration} represents a directed distance between two points on + * the time-line and can therefore be positive, zero or negative. + * This method checks whether the length is greater than zero. + * + * @return true if this duration has a total length greater than zero + * @since 18 + */ + public boolean isPositive() { + return (seconds | nanos) > 0; + } +
